colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(ZHES DPAL RDO RJE 'JIGS BYED DPA' BO GCIG PA'I SGRUB THABS 'DI NYID LA,  PAn CHEN THAMS CAD MKHYEN PA'I MDZAD PA'I SGRUB THABS KYI MI GSAL @010B PA RNAMS DER GANG GSUNG LTAR NGAG 'DON 'BA' ZHIG GO BDE BAR BSGRIGS PA 'DI NI GROGS MCHOG DAM PA AER KHE DAR KHAN GNYER BA'I KHA DON DU, ,GNAS LNGA RIG PA'I DZA YA PAndI TA CHEN PO'IU BKA' 'BANGS THA SHAL BA BKRA SHIS RNAM RGYAL GYIS RJES NYID KYIS GSUNG JI LTA BA BZHIN BSGRIGS SHING BSGYUR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA GNYIS PA'I RING LUGS PHYOGS DUS KUN TU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SHU BHAm MASTU SARBA DZA GA TAm, ,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,ZHUS DAG , ,,)
